resources.string: Please restart app for changes to take effect
Error receiving affirmation\nPlease check your internet connection
Hey %s! time to check on daily affirmation…
Hey %s! time to check on daily affirmations and fill out your journal!
To display reminders about affirmations and journal
Using default values, please change them in settings later!
Please update the following according to your preference.
Please fill in both of the requirements!
This app uses HarmonyOS Sans font
Journal entry is empty,\nPlease enter something to save journal.

string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: What was the highlight of your day today?
Did you encounter any challenges or obstacles? How did you handle them?
What are you grateful for today?
Did you learn anything new today? If so, what was it?
How did you feel emotionally throughout the day?
What small act of kindness did you witness or experience today?
Did you achieve any goals or make progress toward them?
What is something you\'re looking forward to in the near future?
Did you spend quality time with loved ones today?
What made you smile or laugh today?
What thoughts or ideas occupied your mind the most today?
Did you engage in any self-care activities today? If so, what did you do?
What was the most significant decision you made today?
Did you face any fears or step out of your comfort zone today?
How did you nourish your mind, body, or soul today?
Did you have any meaningful conversations today? What were they about?
What inspired you today, whether it be a person, a quote, or an event?
How did you contribute to someone else\'s happiness or well-being today?
What did you do to unwind or relax at the end of the day?
Did you encounter any moments of reflection or introspection today?
What are you proud of accomplishing today, no matter how small?
Did you experience any moments of joy or contentment today?
What did you do to stay focused and productive today?
Did you express gratitude to anyone today? If so, who and for what?
How did you respond to any setbacks or disappointments you faced today?
Did you practice mindfulness or meditation today? If so, how did it benefit you?
What inspired you to take action or make a change today?
Did you make any new connections or strengthen existing relationships today?
How did you incorporate creativity into your day, if at all?
What are you excited about for tomorrow?
